org.jasr.currentcy.dao

Interface SampleDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SampleDAOImpl

    public interface SampleDAO
    DAO to handle all persistence for Sample objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<BaseSample> getChangesSnapshot(Currencies currency)
      A list of the latest samples for the specified currency and each exchange with changes on their values since the last sampling.
      java.util.List<CurrencySnapshot> getCurrencySnapshot()
      Returns an entry per exchange containing buy and sell values for each existing currency on the system
      Trend getLatestSamples(java.lang.String source, Currencies currency)
      samples from a source grouped by day.
      java.util.List<Sample> getSnapshot(Currencies currency)
      A list of the latest samples for each exchange registered on the system for the specified currency.
      void saveSnapshot(java.util.List<Sample> samples, Currencies currency) 

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrencySnapshot

        java.util.List<CurrencySnapshot> getCurrencySnapshot()
        Returns an entry per exchange containing buy and sell values for each existing currency on the system
        Returns:
        list of currency snapshots

      • saveSnapshot

        void saveSnapshot(java.util.List<Sample> samples,
                  Currencies currency)

      • getLatestSamples

        Trend getLatestSamples(java.lang.String source,
                       Currencies currency)
        samples from a source grouped by day. 10 latest grouped days.
        Parameters:
        source - the code for the exchange that is to be sampled
        currency - currency to be sampled from the exchange
        Returns:
        A Trend object containing some samples from the specified source and currency

      • getSnapshot

        java.util.List<Sample> getSnapshot(Currencies currency)
        A list of the latest samples for each exchange registered on the system for the specified currency.
        Parameters:
        currency - currency to get samples for.
        Returns:
        the latest sample for each exchange and the specified currency

      • getChangesSnapshot

        java.util.List<BaseSample> getChangesSnapshot(Currencies currency)
        A list of the latest samples for the specified currency and each exchange with changes on their values since the last sampling.
        Parameters:
        currency - currency to get samples for.
        Returns:
        the latest sample for each exchange with differences
